titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7700

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND DIVIDED WE FALL
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE.
Louisville, Set: 10. 1862
Hon: D. C. Wickliffe
Sec: State --
I have issued & delivered the following Comms:
Jacob Nelson Captain -- Jno. B. Russell 1st Lieut David L. Evans 2d Lieut -- Charles S. Rogers Capt: -- Henry W. Caldwell 1st Lieut: Burton W. Darnall 2d. Lieut: and all dated 9 September 1862
J. C. Elliott asst Surgeon, date of Commission 1st July 1862 -- this date, to be changed to 2d Decr 1861, satisfactory evidence being filed to show the first named date was wrong --

The following Commissions are returned -- being improperly issued -- Dont record them --
John D. Belden
D. W. Coleman
Wm Smith
John Brown 2d Lieut:
2d Lieut:
2d Lieut:
2d Lieut: } all dated Aug 10. 1862

Issd & delivered the following Commissions --
James M. Shackelford
Ben H. Bristow
Joseph M. Kennedy
James H. Holloway
James W. Weatherford Colo
Lt Colo
1 Major
2 Major
3 Major } all dated Sep. 9. 1862

Issd & delivered the following Commissions --
Capt George W. Webb --
1 Lieut Henry A. Denton --
2 Lieut Thomas S. Coleman --
Mason Hendrick Capt: --
Felix G. Bannon -- 1 Lieut --
John L. Woodward 2 Lieut --
also Edwin J. Clarke 2 Lieut -- date 18 August 1862

I am
Very Resply
John W. Finnell
Adjt Genl Ken Vols:
